name: Elian, Elisa, ChatAid
description:
"Elian, Elisa, ChatAid" is an short and linear story, in 2 parts, made with RPG Maker MV.

Elian, Elisa, ChatAid

A lazy university student, Elian, and a studious one, Elisa, found a strange device in the basement of their town library.
Said device give them access to ''ChatAid - For those who need help, no matter which world they come from!''.

4 866 words in total.

Bonus Story: Shantalia and Corali'hulu

Very short and linear story. On Ryordant Island, a young virgin must be sacrified to the monster of the sea every 20 years.
Shantalia is the next sacrifice.

1 826 words in total.

Feature

  • A short and linear story, in 2 parts, made with RPG Maker MV.
  • Bonus Story: Shantalia and Corali'hulu
